original_text: There is only one lawgiver and judge, he who is able to save and to destroy. But who are you to judge your neighbor?
korean_text: 입법자와 재판관은 오직 한 분이시니 능히 구원하기도 하시며 멸하기도 하시느니라 너는 누구이기에 이웃을 판단하느냐

sentences.original_text: There is only one lawgiver and judge,
sentences.korean_translation: 법을 세우시는 이와 재판장은 한 분뿐이시며,

sentences.original_text: he who is able to save and to destroy.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 능히 구원도 하시고 멸망도 하시는 이시니라.

sentences.original_text: But who are you to judge your neighbor?
